problem.title: You want a website. But who handles visibility, maintenance and results over time?
problem.imageAlt: Successful team in a professional work setting
problem.point1: Different contacts for design, ads and technical work.
problem.point3: No reliable overview of progress and performance.

solution.title: One point of contact. One system. Clear ownership.
solution.imageAlt: Relieved business owner in a professional setting
solution.benefit1: Website, ads, tracking and maintenance work together.
solution.benefit2: Monthly planning instead of project chaos.

process.title: How collaboration works
process.lead: Three steps. One contact person. One clear system.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.description: We define target audience, offer and priorities so it is clear what matters most online.

system.title: System
system.description: We build or improve your website and align tracking, SEO and campaigns cleanly.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We support continuously, improve with focus and make decisions based on data.

testimonial.title: What my clients say
testimonial.quote: Simon stepped in after my previous developer had to stop. Within a few days, he turned my half-finished website into a fully functional course platform. I am very grateful for his speed, support and reliability.
testimonial.name: Torsten Acht

modelsIntro.title: The right system for your growth
modelsIntro.lead: A website in a monthly model, with support, optimization and clear structure.

item1.title: Websites that generate inquiries
item1.description: Clear page structure, understandable user guidance and a setup that turns interest into concrete inquiries.

item2.title: Technical SEO as a stable base
item2.description: Indexability, speed and structure as the basis for predictable organic visibility.

item3.title: Clean tracking & analytics
item3.description: A measurable data foundation with clear events, funnels and reporting.

item4.title: Continuous conversion optimization
item4.description: Regular improvement of key pages based on behavior data and business priorities.

item5.title: Long-term growth support
item5.description: A structured monthly model with clear goals, central visibility and continuous improvement.

team.title: Structure instead of dependency on one person
team.paragraph1: Zenku Studio works with an international network of strategists, designers, developers and performance specialists. Collaboration is managed centrally with one fixed contact person.
team.paragraph2: Simon Sureshwara leads each project as Lead Strategist and point of contact for strategy, prioritization and delivery quality.

finalCta.title: Let's build your digital infrastructure in a structured way.
finalCta.subtitle: In the first call, we clarify fit, realistic potential and how implementation is organized cleanly.
